name: Unpacking (itch)
description:
Welcome to Unpacker Delivery Service, we heard that you are very good at package inspection and here we care a lot about that...

This game its about inspecting crates and decide if they will pass or not based on the rules, kind a routine job simulator

Currently its just a prototype of the simple idea with 5 days! i will add more content if people get interested

I created a feedback topic here, fell free to ask/suggest anything ;)

Stay tunned on the devblog: https://rodel.itch.io/unpacking/devlog/23680/unpacking-devblog

Created By: @therodel77

Music By: Dmitry Zhbanov
